pkgmetadata.longdescription: Semiparametric Bivariate Correlated Frailty Model // Fit and simulate a semiparametric bivariate correlated frailty models with proportional hazard structure. Frailty distributions, such as gamma and lognormal models are supported. Bivariate gamma fit is obtained using the approach given in Iachine (1995) and lognormal fit is based on the approach by Ripatti and Palmgren (2000) doi:10.1111/j.0006-341X.2000.01016.x.
